oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "War Sends People to the Libraries"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Commercial Appeal; libraries; war; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 1941 clipping from the Commercial Appeal that describes how people were using libraries in response to current events. Note: Multiple clippings mounted.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Maum, Emmett
